mapper.sql: ID, DPRTCODE, JDDXBH, JDDXLX, JDDXMS, BZ, ZT, WHDWID, WHRID, WHSJ
mapper.select:
select a.ID, a.DPRTCODE, a.JDDXBH, a.JDDXLX, a.JDDXMS, a.BZ,
a.ZT, a.WHDWID, a.WHRID, a.WHSJ,b.username,b.realname,c.dprtname
FROM B_H_014 a left join t_user b on a.WHRID=b.id
left join t_department c on a.DPRTCODE=c.id
order by a.WHSJ DESC
order by ${pagination.sort} ${pagination.order}

select a.ID, a.DPRTCODE, a.JDDXBH, a.JDDXLX, a.JDDXMS , a.BZ, a.ZT, a.WHDWID, a.WHRID, a.WHSJ,b.username,b.realname,c.dprtname FROM B_H_014 a left join t_user b on a.WHRID=b.id left join t_department c on a.DPRTCODE=c.id where a.JDDXLX = 1 and zt=1 and (a.DPRTCODE = #{0} or (a.DPRTCODE is null and a.JDDXBH <> #{0}))
select FROM B_H_014 where DPRTCODE is null and zt=1
mapper.insert:
insert into B_H_014
ID,
DPRTCODE,
JDDXBH,
JDDXLX,
JDDXMS,
BZ,
ZT,
WHDWID,
WHRID,
WHSJ,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{jddxbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{jddxlx,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{jddxms,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
1,
#{whdwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
current_timestamp
mapper.update:
update B_H_014
JDDXBH = #{jddxbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JDDXLX = #{jddxlx,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
JDDXMS = #{jddxms,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BZ = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZT = #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WHDWID = #{whdwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHRID = #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHSJ = current_timestamp,
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into B_H_014 (ID, DPRTCODE, JDDXBH, JDDXLX, JDDXMS, BZ, ZT, WHDWID, WHRID, WHSJ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jddxbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jddxlx,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{jddxms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{whdwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{whsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update:
update B_H_014
set JDDXBH = #{jddxbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JDDXLX = #{jddxlx,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, JDDXMS = #{jddxms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BZ = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZT = #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WHDWID = #{whdwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHRID = #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHSJ = #{whsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select from B_H_014 where JDDXBH = #{1, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and zt =1

select
from B_H_014 where ZT = 1 and (DPRTCODE = #{dprtcode} or (DPRTCODE is null and JDDXBH <> #{dprtcode})) order by jddxms
